metadata.description: This document features various newspapers collected by First Lady Aurora Aragon Quezon, wife of First President of the Commonwealth of the Philippines Manuel L. Quezon, from 1942 to 1945. These newspapers include the Philadelphia Record, the New York Times, the Los Angeles-based Philippines Star Press, the Philippines News Herald (also based in Los Angeles), the Times Herald (Vallejo, California), the Philippines Mail (Salinas, California), the Philippines Bataan Herald (Delano, California), and the Manila Post Herald (Los Angeles, California).
metadata.subject: newspapers
metadata.title: Miscellaneous Newsclippings
